name: AT30 - Clone any Tiktok Video and Repurpose it

parameters.content:
## Images only
**You can upload only images on Pinterest and Bluesky

## Blotato Setup Guide

To use this automation, you'll need a Blotato account.  
ðŸ‘‰ [Register here](https://dub.sh/blotato)

After registering, watch this short video to see how everything works:  
ðŸ“º [Watch on YouTube](https://youtu.be/ZJ8I9N-JwXQ?si=ZIpyFLLgmi74HQeD)

## JSON2Video
**If you have an account with credits you can use JSON2Video
** Please make sure you bind the node Airtable 6 with the Set ID Node

To customize my template:
1) Go to https://json2video.com/tools/visual-editor/?template=AQtlyegCrVPAMh8SXvVY
2) A pop-up will tell you that the template is not yours and that you can save it to your account
3) Go to the "Template" menu on the top bar and click on "Save template as...". This will save it to your account and it will create a new template ID
4) Edit the template as needed. I recommend you editing the JSON manually from "Edit template's JSON" option in the "Template" menu
5) Once edited, use the new template ID in your automation
